name: My Beauty Salon - Jobs
description:
Come help take care all the women at My Beauty Salon - Jobs. Featuring 10 different activities/jobs to choose from.

Jobs:
-Doctor
-Nurse
-Police Officer
-Teacher
-Zookeeper
-Movie Star
-Astronaut
-Cheerleader
-Business Woman
-Veterinarian

*Please note that My Beauty Salon - Jobs is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Kids Games Studio is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.
